properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 v7

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jina Lako Baba litukuzwe
utawale petu milele yote. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Baba yetu mwema
uliye mbinguni,
jina lako Baba litukuzwe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Na ufalme wako
uje hapa kwetu,
na mapenzi yako yatimilike

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tupe leo mkate wa kila siku,
tupe leo mkate wa kila siku.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na utusamehe
makosa yetu,
kama tufanyavyo
kwa ndugu zetu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Situtie Baba kishawishini,
bali maovuni utuopoe.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Ufalme na nguvu
na utukufu,
vyote vyako Baba
hata milele.
